name: SAVE THE PLANET (itch) (RisWorks)
description:
Welcome to the First RisWorks Team game,
Are you ready to start a new action adventure?
Save The Planet is 2D Shooter game where you fight against zombies. The game has a story based on saving the planet from zombies. Story will continue in the next chapter!
Please, write down comments, criticisms and suggestion for the game.

-!- To run the game you need NET 3.1 (You can find the link in the Fix.txt file located in the Requirements Folder in RAR)

- The game will be updated every few weeks.
- Enjoy the gameplay.
